article_title: Cuba’s doctors are in high demand
article_description: The communist island s practice of exporting medical workers has a dark side
article_content: Apr 4th 2020 FLORENCE AND MEXICO CITY WHEN THE number of patients mounts but the number of healers does not  whom do you call  That was the question for Giulio Gallera  the health minister in Lombardy  the Italian region worst hit by covid 19  The army was    4193 chars
